name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Marie Le Conte -> Marie Le Pepe

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text 'Marie Le Conte' with 'Marie Le Pepe', on the entire internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replaces the text 'Marie Le Conte' with 'Marie Le Pepe', on the entire internet.
